title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, April 14, 2015
description: Airing on Tuesday, April 14, 2015: First up, we talk to Dan Hutcheson, CEO of VLSI research, about Intel and the chip market for the Internet of Things. We also talk with Kelly Goldsmith, Assistant Professor of Marketing at Northwestern University, about The Reddit Button. And Sara Sorcher, Cybersecurity Editor at The Christian Science Monitor, joins us to talk about why states are trying to lure companies to create the Silicon Valley of Cybersecurity.
